import React from 'react'; import ReactDOM from 'react-dom'; import './SignUp.css' class FormSignup extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { username: '', email: '', password:'', password2: '' } } onNameChange(event) { this.setState({username: event.target.value}) } onEmailChange(event) { this.setState({email: event.target.value}) } onPasswordChange(event) { this.setState({password: event.target.value}) } onPassword2Change(event) { this.setState({password2: event.target.value}) } render() { return (

צרו חשבון עכשיו

יש לך חשבון קיים? לחץ כאן לכניסה
); } } export default FormSignup;
